features.name: Export Workout
features.description: Export (upload) a workout's data (including it's images) to the cloud where it can be downloaded by another user.

features.name: Share Workout
features.description: Send workout's key and creator's user id via SMS where it can be used to download by another user.

features.name: Import Workout
features.description: Import (download) a specific workout (including it's images) by providing its creator's user id and workout key.

features.name: Create, Update and Delete workouts
features.description: Create, update and delete workouts, including its workout days, exercises, sets and reps.

features.name: Working Out
features.description: Executing a specific workout, starting at any day, or any exercise.

features.name: Maintain Exercises Media Library
features.description: Add, Update and Delete exercise's (media) images, including importing device's photos and taking pictures using the devise's camera.

features.name: Associate Muscle Groups to Exercises
features.description: Exercise can be associated with various muscle groups. This can be used to search for exercises that impacts specific muscle groups.
